text: The women's singles tennis event of the 2011 Pan American Games was held on October 17–21 at the Telcel Tennis Complex in Guadalajara.Tennis technical manual The reigning Pan American Games champion, Milagros Sequera of Venezuela, did not defend her title. __TOC__ == Seeds == == Draw == Women's singles draw === Finals === === Top half === === Bottom half === == References == Women's Singles
title: Tennis at the 2011 Pan American Games – Women's Singles
